tagline: Cost-Effective Scalability with On-Demand, Pre-Vetted Talent
title: Bug Bounty Programs
content: Identifying vulnerabilities requires diverse skills often not available in-house. Crowdsourcing offers a highly effective solution, and the Cyberbay Platform connects you with pre-vetted bug hunters who provide specialized expertise when you need it.

gridLeft.title: Why This Matters
gridLeft.description: Crowdsourcing your bug bounty programs provides cost-effective, on-demand scalability and a wider talent pool to strengthen your defenses against cyber attacks.

gridRight.title: Public vs. Private Programs
gridRight.description: Public programs are open to all Cyberbay bug hunters, while private programs are invitation-only. Contact us to discuss which type of program is best for you.
